title: General
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

  • 1 point for time comparison that primary succession takes longer than secondary succession

1. Volcano erupts

  1. Immediate (1 point)

    • Primary succession/no soil.

  2. Long-term (1 point)

    • Lava must be degraded by weathering, microbes, lichens, fungi to form soils.

    • Lots of light is available (photophilic organisms will thrive when soil is present.)

2. Mature forest is clear cut

  1. Immediate (1 point)

    • Secondary succession/ soil present

    • All life is not destroyed.

    • Seed banks are present

    • Different/other habitats/ niches open/close.

  2. Long-term (1 point)

    • Loss of trees may lead to erosion and soil loss.

    • Lots of light is available.

    • Many smaller plants actually benefit.
